Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Junior standing and PHI 2010, or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: A critical investigation of the meaning and significance of various kinds of love from a variety of philosophical perspectives.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text:
Complete the following: 
ENC1102 - Composition II (3)

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Contemporary issues and perspectives in feminist theory and their relation to divergent feminist practices.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Study of the nature of, and justifications for, law and punishment. Examination of the concepts of legal personhood, rights and responsibilities.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Major contemporary positions in environmental philosophy, including deep ecology, ecofeminism, and social ecology.

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Junior standing or PHI 2010 or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Philosophical analysis & evaluation of selected issues arising from the interaction of the individual, society, and the state; includes topics such as freedom, equality, and justice.
